description:
'Kiss my lips. Please praise me every day and pet me.'

In order to survive, Prince Seung Wan seduced his father, the emperor. The emperor, unable to withstand his coquetries, got entangled in bed with his son. Nights of depravity went on until the day Seung Wan cut the emperor's throat and became a king slayer.

'I will fill up elder brother's hole with my seeds. Elder brother, please give birth to my children.'

He ended up falling to Yi Do's hands, pushed down by his own younger brother night after night.>
